extendedInfo.description: HCCA's 2013 Compliance Institute 'HCCAci' App is your full featured guide to manage your conference attendance.   App features include: â¢ Native app: No wifi connection required to access the conference program, schedule or animated maps.   â¢ Now section: Stay informed about hot issues, event program changes, your upcoming sessions and organizer messages.   â¢ Program section: Browse the entire program to build your personal schedule, bookmark sessions or speakers, or access session handouts and powerpoint presentations.â¢ Exhibitors, Maps, related conference info and much more.Keywords: hcca, hccaci, compliance institute, ativ, eventpilot, conference apps, mobile app

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app helped me navigate a wonderful educational experience.
reviews.author: Raquel Harrison
